snippet: A businessman embroiled in a campaign finance scandal communicated with an adviser to Bill and Hillary Rodham Clinton on an illegal canvassing effort to bolster Mrs. Clinton’s 2008 campaign, court documents say.
abstract: Court documents show that wealthy Washington businessman Jeffrey E Thompson, who is embroiled in campaign finance scandal, communicated with longtime Clinton adviser Minyon Moore on illegal canvassing effort to bolster Hillary Clinton's 2008 presidential campaign; details about relationship came to light after Thompson pleaded guilty to charges that he and his companies had made $3.3 million in illegal campaign contributions to wide range of candidates for elective office.
lead_paragraph: A businessman embroiled in a campaign finance scandal communicated with an adviser to Bill and Hillary Rodham Clinton on an illegal canvassing effort to bolster Mrs. Clinton’s 2008 campaign, court documents say.

headline.main: Clinton Aide Linked to Campaign Scandal
headline.print_headline: Clinton Aide Linked to Campaign Scandal
